title: Take-Aways from the Innovation-X Roundtable: Innovation in Times of Change
author: Suyash Jaju
excerpt: Black swans are rare and unpredictable events that create a huge impact on the ways we live and work. During the Covid-19 pandemic, individuals and companies have to adapt to a new normal for daily life. Which industries are thriving and which are struggling in the new normal?
